definition: moderately/appropriate
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
see 李适[Li3 Kuo4]
surname Shi
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Quality and moderation often bring more joy than an excess.
sentences.chinese: 品质和适度通常会比超额带来更多的欢乐。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 热环境舒适度指标是建筑节能设计的关键之一。

sentences.english: The radiant ceiling cooling is a new technology with higher comfortable degree in the air-conditioning field.
sentences.chinese: 楼板辐射供冷是一种舒适度很高的新型空调技术。

sentences.english: Moderate shade can protect shade endurance plants from photooxidation injury.
sentences.chinese: 适度遮荫可以有效的防止耐荫植物发生光氧化伤害。

sentences.english: Turn the throttle twist grip properly to continue preheating the engine for 1-3 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 适度扭动转把式油门使发动机持续预热1至3分钟。

sentences.english: The authors suggest a simplified method of significant test for the compatibility of curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种曲线拟合适度显著性检验的简化法。

sentences.english: Cork and leather footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 软木和皮革鞋底，增加舒适度。

sentences.english: These luxurious and soft egyptian cotton hipsters are great in both comfort and support.
sentences.chinese: 豪华柔软的埃及棉，能提供最好的舒适度与支持度。

sentences.english: The modest man moderately modified the model in this mode.
sentences.chinese: 谦虚者适度地用这种方法点窜了模型。

sentences.english: Right now that target price has a modest but steady economic recovery as a major assumption.
sentences.chinese: 此刻这个目标价位如同总体想定一样，适度而平稳。

sentences.english: In addition, our intermediate-term indicators are currently moderately bearish.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我们的中期指标正在适度地悲观。

sentences.english: Regular style globe valves are suitable for moderate throttling applications.
sentences.chinese: 一般的截止阀适合用于适度的节流应用。

sentences.english: The Neck. The neck is powerful, of good length, and well arched.
sentences.chinese: 有力，有足够的长度，适度圆拱。

sentences.english: These systems use very little energy but care must be taken to ensure the occupants' comfort.
sentences.chinese: 这些系统能耗小，但应注意人体舒适度。

sentences.english: Confucius thought moderate amounts of fun were acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 孔子认为，适度的享乐是可以接受的。

sentences.english: A custom-made crescent-shaped foam pad to sit you up in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 一个定制的月牙形泡沫垫坐你在舒适度。
